name: Heian Yondan
hiraganaName: へいあん よんだん
description: The fourth kata in the Heian series, introducing advanced techniques including cross stance (kosa-dachi), wedge blocks (kakiwake-uke), and knee strikes (hiza-geri). Features slow breathing movements at the beginning and complex combination techniques throughout.
